verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> or Song <S%H7892><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. Let 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, let his enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> be scattered <S%H6327><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: let them also that hate <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8764><s%> him flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him.

As smoke <S%H6227><s%> is driven away <S%H5086><s%> <S%H8736><s%>, so drive them away <S%H5086><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: as wax <S%H1749><s%> melteth <S%H4549><s%> <S%H8736><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%>, so let the wicked <S%H7563><s%> perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

But let the righteous <S%H6662><s%> be glad <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; let them rejoice <S%H5970><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: yea, let them exceedingly <S%H8057><s%> rejoice <S%H7797><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Sing <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, sing praises <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8761><s%> to his name <S%H8034><s%>: extol <S%H5549><s%> <S%H8798><s%> him that rideth <S%H7392><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon the heavens <S%H6160><s%> by his name <S%H8034><s%> YAH <S%H3050><s%>, and rejoice <S%H5937><s%> <S%H8798><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him.
A father <S%H1><s%> of the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and a judge <S%H1781><s%> of the widows <S%H490><s%>, is 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> in his holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation <S%H4583><s%>.

'Elohim <S%H430><s%> setteth <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the solitary <S%H3173><s%> in families <S%H1004><s%>: he bringeth out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8688><s%> those which are bound <S%H615><s%> with chains <S%H3574><s%>: but the rebellious <S%H5637><s%> <S%H8802><s%> dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in a dry <S%H6707><s%> land.

O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, when thou wentest forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%>, when thou didst march <S%H6805><s%> <S%H8800><s%> through the wilderness <S%H3452><s%>; Selah <S%H5542><s%>:

The earth <S%H776><s%> shook <S%H7493><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, the heavens <S%H8064><s%> also dropped <S%H5197><s%> <S%H8804><s%> at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: even Sinai <S%H5514><s%> itself <S%H2088><s%> was moved at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

Thou, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, didst send <S%H5130><s%> <S%H8686><s%> a plentiful <S%H5071><s%> rain <S%H1653><s%>, whereby thou didst confirm <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8790><s%> thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, when it was weary <S%H3811><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.

Thy congregation <S%H2416><s%> hath dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> therein: thou, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, hast prepared <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8686><s%> of thy goodness <S%H2896><s%> for the poor <S%H6041><s%>.
The YY <S%H136><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the word <S%H562><s%>: great <S%H7227><s%> was the company <S%H6635><s%> of those that published <S%H1319><s%> <S%H8764><s%> it.

Kings <S%H4428><s%> of armies <S%H6635><s%> did flee <S%H5074><s%> <S%H8799><s%> apace <S%H5074><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and she that tarried <S%H5116><s%> at home <S%H1004><s%> divided <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%>.

Though ye have lien <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%> among the pots <S%H8240><s%>, yet shall ye be as the wings <S%H3671><s%> of a dove <S%H3123><s%> covered <S%H2645><s%> <S%H8737><s%> with silver <S%H3701><s%>, and her feathers <S%H84><s%> with yellow <S%H3422><s%> gold <S%H2742><s%>.
When 'El SHaddai <S%H7706><s%> scattered <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8763><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> in it, it was white as snow <S%H7949><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in Salmon <S%H6756><s%>.
The hill <S%H2022><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is as the hill <S%H2022><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>; an high <S%H1386><s%> hill <S%H2022><s%> as the hill <S%H2022><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>.

Why leap <S%H7520><s%> <S%H8762><s%> ye, ye high <S%H1386><s%> hills <S%H2022><s%>? this is the hill <S%H2022><s%> which 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> desireth <S%H2530><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to dwell in <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; yea, the YY <S%H3068><s%> will dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in it for ever <S%H5331><s%>.

The chariots <S%H7393><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> are twenty thousand <S%H7239><s%>, even thousands <S%H505><s%> of angels <S%H8136><s%>: the YY <S%H136><s%> is among them, as in Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place.

Thou hast ascended <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> on high <S%H4791><s%>, thou hast led captivity <S%H7628><s%> captive <S%H7617><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: thou hast received <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> gifts <S%H4979><s%> for men <S%H120><s%>; yea, for the rebellious <S%H5637><s%> <S%H8802><s%> also, that the YY <S%H3050><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> might dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8800><s%> among them.

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be the YY <S%H136><s%>, who daily <S%H3117><s%> <S%H3117><s%> loadeth <S%H6006><s%> <S%H8799><s%> us with benefits, even the 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> of our salvation <S%H3444><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
He that is our 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> is the 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> of salvation <S%H4190><s%>; and unto GOD <S%H3069><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> belong the issues <S%H8444><s%> from death <S%H4194><s%>.

But 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> shall wound <S%H4272><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of his enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and the hairy <S%H8181><s%> scalp <S%H6936><s%> of such an one as goeth on still <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8693><s%> in his trespasses <S%H817><s%>.

The YY <S%H136><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, I will bring again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> from Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, I will bring my people again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> from the depths <S%H4688><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>:

That thy foot <S%H7272><s%> may be dipped <S%H4272><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of thine enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of thy dogs <S%H3611><s%> in the same.

They have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy goings <S%H1979><s%>, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>; even the goings <S%H1979><s%> of my 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>, my King <S%H4428><s%>, in the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>.

The singers <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8802><s%> went before <S%H6923><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, the players on instruments <S%H5059><s%> <S%H8802><s%> followed after <S%H310><s%>; among <S%H8432><s%> them were the damsels <S%H5959><s%> playing with timbrels <S%H8608><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.
Bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8761><s%> ye 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> in the congregations <S%H4721><s%>, even the YY <S%H136><s%>, from the fountain <S%H4726><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

There is little <S%H6810><s%> Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> with their ruler <S%H7287><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> and their council <S%H7277><s%>, the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Z'vulun <S%H2074><s%>, and the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Naftali <S%H5321><s%>.

Thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thy strength <S%H5797><s%>: strengthen <S%H5810><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, that which <S%H2098><s%> thou hast wrought <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for us.
Because of thy temple <S%H1964><s%> at Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> shall kings <S%H4428><s%> bring <S%H2986><s%> <S%H8686><s%> presents <S%H7862><s%> unto thee.

Rebuke <S%H1605><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the company <S%H2416><s%> of spearmen <S%H7070><s%>, the multitude <S%H5712><s%> of the bulls <S%H47><s%>, with the calves <S%H5695><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, till every one submit <S%H7511><s%> <S%H8693><s%> himself with pieces <S%H7518><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>: scatter <S%H967><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thou the people <S%H5971><s%> that delight <S%H2654><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in war <S%H7128><s%>.

Princes <S%H2831><s%> shall come out <S%H857><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> shall soon stretch out <S%H7323><s%> <S%H8686><s%> her hands <S%H3027><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

Sing <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, ye kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; O sing praises <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto the YY <S%H136><s%>; Selah <S%H5542><s%>:

To him that rideth <S%H7392><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon the heavens <S%H8064><s%> of heavens <S%H8064><s%>, which were of old <S%H6924><s%>; lo, he doth send out <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, and that a mighty <S%H5797><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>.

Ascribe <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye strength <S%H5797><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: his excellency <S%H1346><s%> is over Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and his strength <S%H5797><s%> is in the clouds <S%H7834><s%>.

O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, thou art terrible <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8737><s%> out of thy holy places <S%H4720><s%>: the 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> is he that giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> strength <S%H5797><s%> and power <S%H8592><s%> unto his people <S%H5971><s%>. Blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.
